com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.client

Interface DefaultHttpClientFactory.Options

  • Enclosing class:
    DefaultHttpClientFactory

    public static interface DefaultHttpClientFactory.Options

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_FOLLOW_REDIRECTS 
      static int DEFAULT_REQUEST_BUFFER_SIZE
      The default maximum size of the jetty request buffer (@value 16384).
      static int DEFAULT_RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE
      The default maximum size of the jetty response buffer (@value 16384).
      static String DEFAULT_SSL_KEYSTORE_PATH
      There is no default SSL keystore.
      static String FOLLOW_REDIRECTS 
      static String REQUEST_BUFFER_SIZE
      The name of the system property that may be used to specify the maximum size (in bytes) for the Jetty request buffer (default @value 16384)
      static String RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE
      The name of the system property that may be used to specify the maximum size (in bytes) for the Jetty response buffer (default @value 16384)
      static String SSL_KEYSTORE_PATH
      This is the name of an optional System property that may be used to override the IHttpClientFactory implementation class (default ).

    • Field Detail

      • SSL_KEYSTORE_PATH

        static final String SSL_KEYSTORE_PATH
        This is the name of an optional System property that may be used to override the IHttpClientFactory implementation class (default ).

      • DEFAULT_SSL_KEYSTORE_PATH

        static final String DEFAULT_SSL_KEYSTORE_PATH
        There is no default SSL keystore. When not specified, all SSL end points will be trusted.

      • FOLLOW_REDIRECTS

        static final String FOLLOW_REDIRECTS

      • DEFAULT_FOLLOW_REDIRECTS

        static final String DEFAULT_FOLLOW_REDIRECTS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE

        static final String RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE
        The name of the system property that may be used to specify the maximum size (in bytes) for the Jetty response buffer (default @value 16384)
        See Also:
        Set query timeout and response buffer length on jetty response listener, Set jetty request buffer size

      • DEFAULT_RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE

        static final int DEFAULT_RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE
        The default maximum size of the jetty response buffer (@value 16384).

        Note: The default value for the jetty platform is 16kb.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUEST_BUFFER_SIZE

        static final String REQUEST_BUFFER_SIZE
        The name of the system property that may be used to specify the maximum size (in bytes) for the Jetty request buffer (default @value 16384)
        See Also:
        Set jetty request buffer size

      • DEFAULT_REQUEST_BUFFER_SIZE

        static final int DEFAULT_REQUEST_BUFFER_SIZE
        The default maximum size of the jetty request buffer (@value 16384).

        Note: The default value for the jetty platform is 4kb.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
